html:
29 Nov 2024

New Anti-Terrorism Thriller Novels for Fans of Homeland

Love the suspense and intrigue of Homeland? These new anti-terrorism thrillers deliver intense plots, high-stakes drama, and unforgettable characters—perfect for your next heart-pounding read.

Forecast

by Aaron Ryan

Release Date: October 31 2024

From the bestselling author of the alien invasion military science fiction thriller series “Dissonance,” Aaron Ryan weaves a complex tale of butterfly effect and chaos theory in the unputdownable, “Forecast.” What if you could undo 9/11 and prevent tragedy?

Buy on Amazon

Kip 2 (Kip Callahan)

by John Deacon

Release Date: November 15 2024

Most of his life, Kip rode for the brand. Then tragedy struck. He rode alone into Dry Gulch, where he uncovered a criminal organization bent on ruling the West. Now, riding for a mysterious new brand, Kip strikes out to destroy evil, reveal truth, and impart justice. Kip is ready to die for these things. But suddenly, he also has a reason to live.

Buy on Amazon

Breaking Point (Adam Burke Book 3)

by Bradley Wright

Release Date: October 31 2024

An asset is lost in the Middle East. It’s a war zone. The details are sketchy. The terrain is dangerous. Adam Burke is their only hope.

Buy on Amazon

Hunting Killers (Michael Colton, USMC Ret. Book 4)

by Cliff Mansfield

Release Date: November 6 2024

From the mean streets of Portland, Oregon, to the steaming jungles of Guatemala, nothing will stop Michael Colton from bringing cop killer Paiyaso Garcia to justice. Not even a confrontation with FAR rebels.

Buy on Amazon

The Unraveling

by Jack Hunt

Release Date: November 15 2024

As Black Friday shoppers crowd stores across the nation, a different kind of darkness descends. When a devastating virus begins to spread—erasing memories and identities before claiming its victims—former CDC coordinator Nate Holloway races against time to get his estranged daughter, Sophie, to safety.

Buy on Amazon

Echoes of Deception (A Colin Frost Political Thriller)

by Brad Pierce

Release Date: November 13 2024

Echoes of Deception delivers a high-octane narrative of espionage, betrayal, and the undying quest for truth in a world shrouded in lies. This gripping sequel in the Colin Frost series is a must-read for fans of pulse-pounding action and intricate suspense.

Buy on Amazon
